PerfectNetExp.abs: 关于《失园》的空间研究,除探讨弥尔顿的宇宙观或宇宙志(cosmography) 之外,亦有学者针对诗人对特定空间场域的构想、铺陈,如地狱的构成、撒旦及堕天使与地狱的.
cosmographer 宇宙学家cosmography 宇宙学cosmoline 防腐油
首先是因为能与你这位义大利人为友,其次是因为发现我们都对于哥白尼的宇宙结构学(cosmography)有共识。如同你信末亲切邀请我加入与你通信,我很乐意尝试如此做,(…).

list.abs: a scientist knowledgeable about cosmography .通晓宇宙学的科学家。
modern cosmography and its philosophical enlightenment ., 现代宇宙学及其哲学启示.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French cosmographie, or via late Latin from Greek kosmographia, from kosmos (see cosmos) + -graphia 'writing'

means.word_mean: 1. the science that maps the general features of the universe; describes both heaven and earth (but without encroaching on geography or astronomy)
2. a representation of the earth or the heavens;
